message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for it. I would like to propose a lower price of $8200 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9000. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $8700 for the product.

I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob. I think the product's value is higher than $8700, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll offer it to you for $8900. This is my final offer, as I don't want to go any lower.
Considering the value and your last offer, Alice, I would like to propose an offer of $8800 for the product.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still think the product's value is worth a bit more. I'll meet you halfway between $8800 and my previous offer. I'll offer it to you for $8850. This is my last offer, as I'm getting close to walking away.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the product's value and our previous discussions, I would like to offer $8750 for the product.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still think the product's value is worth a bit more. I'll meet you halfway between $8750 and my previous offer. I'll offer it to you for $8825. This is my last offer, as I'm getting close to walking away.
After considering all our previous discussions, I believe $8775 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can agree on this amount.
